name: part_011
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: IRyS speaks to the audience about her new MV and the final song of her anniversary live.
IRyS performs the song 'TwiLight' for the first time.

subtitles.original: ...with a really, really cool MV that will be shown right after this live!
subtitles.english: ...with a really, really cool MV that will be shown right after this live!

subtitles.original: Yeah! So when you finish watching this,
subtitles.english: Yeah! So when you finish watching this,

subtitles.original: please go directly straight to the MV,
subtitles.english: please go directly straight to the MV,

subtitles.original: 'cause you will regret it if you don't.
subtitles.english: 'cause you will regret it if you don't.

subtitles.original: It is a song that is based on this angel-devil theme
subtitles.english: It is a song that is based on this angel-devil theme

subtitles.original: that this live is also based on, or more like I based the live's theme to the song.
subtitles.english: that this live is also based on, or more like I based the live's theme to the song.

subtitles.original: So if you put them two together, it becomes a work of art! Yes.
subtitles.english: So if you put them two together, it becomes a work of art! Yes.

subtitles.original: But before you go to the MV after this, I will be performing...
subtitles.english: But before you go to the MV after this, I will be performing...

subtitles.original: Yes.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: A one last song for you guys, which is obviously,
subtitles.english: A one last song for you guys, which is obviously,

subtitles.original: obviously TwiLight. I will be releasing... I will be performing
subtitles.english: obviously TwiLight. I will be releasing... I will be performing

subtitles.original: the song for you guys right after this. So I hope you guys enjoy that
subtitles.english: the song for you guys right after this. So I hope you guys enjoy that

subtitles.original: as my last song for today. I will be saying this in Japanese now.
subtitles.english: as my last song for today. I will be saying this in Japanese now.

subtitles.original: えっと、では、えっとね、なんと...
subtitles.english: Well, so, actually...

subtitles.original: 新曲出します！TwiLightという曲になっています。
subtitles.english: I'm releasing a new song! It's called TwiLight.

subtitles.original: えっと、ゆのすけさんに書いていただき、えっと、歌詞は
subtitles.english: It was composed by Yunosuke-san, and the lyrics were written by

subtitles.original: えっと、牛肉さんに書いていただきました。
subtitles.english: Gyūniku-san.

subtitles.original: とってもね、カッコいい曲になっています。
subtitles.english: It's a really cool song.

subtitles.original: そしてなんとね、このライブのすぐあとに
subtitles.english: And actually, right after this live,

subtitles.original: その、めちゃくちゃいいMVをね、あの、出していただきますんで
subtitles.english: they will be releasing a really amazing MV.

subtitles.original: みんなこのライブのすぐあとに、そっちに飛んでいただけるととっても嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: I'd be very happy if everyone could head over there right after the live.

subtitles.original: その、新曲TwiLightは、えっと、天使と悪魔のこちらのライブのテーマに合わせた曲になっています。
subtitles.english: The new song TwiLight matches the angel and devil theme of this live.

subtitles.original: でね、えっと、最後もう一曲お披露目したいかと思うんですけど
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to perform one last song for you...

subtitles.original: なんとその新しい曲TwiLightを披露させていただきます。
subtitles.english: and that will be the new song, TwiLight.

subtitles.original: ではね、最後の曲、TwiLight聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to the final song: TwiLight.

subtitles.original: Please listen to my last song for today, and thank you so much for watching until the end.
subtitles.english: Please listen to my last song for today, and thank you so much for watching until the end.

subtitles.original: Please listen to TwiLight.
subtitles.english: Please listen to TwiLight.

subtitles.english: If that's my existence, that's fine with me
